Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:32:31
Folder: C19QOT8 - major incident resolved email service outage
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C19QOT8_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-29 21:00
Subject: Major Incident Resolved: Email Service Outage
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear All,

 

We have had confirmation from Microsoft that they have now resolved the issue with the Email service.

 

All emails should now be able to be sent and received without delay.  However, any emails that were sent during the outage will be released in batches and so may take a little time to arrive.

 

Start Date and Time: Fri, 29 Aug 16:21 PM GST

End Time : Fri,  29 Aug 20:30 PM GST

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
